sources.name: positive_over_tid_fil
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  positive_over_tid_fil

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared positive_over_tid_fil = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://websiteimagesblob202109.blob.core.windows.net/covid19/overvaagningsdata-covid19-12082021-2e37/Test_pos_over_time.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ";", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = positive_over_tid_fil,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"PrevPos", "Tested", "Tested_kumulativ"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed columns", each Text.Contains([Date], "-")),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Filtered rows", {{"Date", type date}, {"NewPositive", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Changed column type", {"NotPrevPos", "PosPct"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns 1", {{"NewPositive", "NyePositive"}, {"Date", "Dato"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
